definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: We"ve only sold our product at trade fairs, not in an on-going sales campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我們的產品只在商展時展售，而沒有辦促銷活動。

sentences.english: We've only sold our product at trade fairs, not in an on-going sales campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我們的產品只在商展時展售，而沒有辦促銷活動。

sentences.english: Two of the most popular trade shows are held in Beijing and Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 兩個最熱門的商展是在北京和上海辦的。

sentences.english: We"ve only sold our product at trade fairs, not in an on-going sales campaign."
sentences.chinese: 我們的產物只在商展時展售，而沒有辦促銷運動。

sentences.english: Wee only sold our product at trade fairs, not in an on-going sales campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我們的產品只在商展時展售，而沒有辦活動。

sentences.english: An agricultural organization can put on a trade show where its members can promote themselves.
sentences.chinese: 農業組織可以舉行一個讓會員推廣自己的商展。

sentences.english: There are many computers on display at that trade show.
sentences.chinese: 那個商展展出了許多電腦。

sentences.english: This shop sells a wide range of watches all of which are the choicest.
sentences.chinese: 這家商展賣的腕錶都是精品，而且種類還出格多。

sentences.english: Tax-exempt articles are sold at the designated stores.
sentences.chinese: 免稅商品正在指定商展出售。

sentences.english: Tendence Lifestyle showcases everything that your target groups might want.
sentences.chinese: 趨勢生活型態商展指出你的目標受衆羣所想要的一切。

sentences.english: Flying to the trade show is a necessary expense.
sentences.chinese: 去飛機去參加商展是必要的花費。
我想我們應該參加商展。

sentences.english: Ensure the quality of PA services for the large-scale performances and show.
sentences.chinese: 保證了大型演出和商展會議的優質擴聲服務。

definition: to display and sell (e.g. at a fair)/sales exhibition
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
relative position of exhibition booth/allocated floor space for display stall/allotted exhibit area

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Mao4 yi4 Fa1 zhan3 ju2
